name: karma-mockserver
description: A simple Karma framework to start a node script (which is supposed to start a server written with node).

scripts.unittest: mkdir -p "report/tests" && env BABEL_ENV='test' XUNIT_FILE='report/tests/TESTS-NodeJS.xml' node node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --ui bdd --recursive 'unittest/*.spec.js' -R spec-xunit-file
